name: Vikas Verma

full_output.summary: Dynamic and results-driven B.Tech Final year student with a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology. Proficient in programming languages such as Python, Java and SQL with a solid understanding of data structures and algorithms with hands-on experience through internships and academic projects. Strong problem-solving skills, a quick learner, and a team player with a passion for creating efficient and scalable software solutions. Seeking an entry-level position to apply technical skills and contribute to innovative projects in the software industry.

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: CineStream
projects.description: Built a streaming platform using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB Atlas, and Tailwind CSS. Integrated JWT-based authentication and designed a responsive UI for seamless user experience across devices. Developed features such as movie/TV show search, actor search, trailer viewing, and similar content recommendations. Implemented functionality for fetching movies, TV shows, search history, and more. Deployed the platform with scalability and performance enhancements using MongoDB Atlas.

projects.name: WanderLust: Vacation Rental Destination
projects.description: Created a full-stack Airbnb clone using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Developed intuitive user interfaces with React.js for seamless property browsing and booking functionalities. Implemented secure user authentication using JWT (JSON Web Tokens) to protect user sessions. Utilized MongoDB for scalable data storage, ensuring optimal performance as the platform grows.

projects.name: Potato Leaf Disease Detection
projects.description: Developed a system using machine learning and computer vision technique achieving over 98% accuracy in identifying diseases like late blight, early blight, and potato virus Y. Implemented a user-friendly interface allowing farmers to easily upload leaf images and receive disease diagnosis results. TensorFlow and OpenCV for model development and image processing, ensuring robust performance.
